title: Sunflower Note — single-page bouquet hero with glassmorphism note overlay

requirements.summary: Create a minimalist responsive single-page layout with #FAFAFA background and centered hero content across viewport sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is centered both horizontally and vertically on common viewport sizes.
Layout remains usable and visually balanced on mobile widths (~375px) and large desktop widths (>=1440px).

file_operations.description: Implement the single-page centered hero layout (full-viewport centering with responsive sizing) and mount the hero content as the only page.
Define global styles to enforce the solid #FAFAFA background and baseline responsive layout behavior (e.g., body/root sizing).

requirements.summary: Render the centered sunflower bouquet hero image and apply a subtle looping breathing scale animation (~1%–2%).
acceptanceCriteria: A sunflower bouquet photo is displayed as the primary centered hero image.
The hero image uses a smooth looping scale animation between ~1.01 and ~1.02 (or equivalent subtle range) without jarring transitions.

file_operations.description: Render the hero image (from the generated static asset) and apply a subtle breathing animation to the image element while maintaining centered composition.
Add the CSS keyframes/class for the breathing animation (smooth scale loop in the ~1.01–1.02 range).

requirements.summary: Add interactions so clicking the bouquet image or an "Open Note" button opens a centered overlay note card above the bouquet.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the bouquet opens the note card.
Clicking the "Open Note" button opens the note card.
When open, the note card is centered over the hero content.

file_operations.description: Add UI state and handlers so both the hero image and a small "Open Note" button toggle the overlay note card; ensure the overlay is centered above the hero.

requirements.summary: Style the overlay note card with minimalist glassmorphism and modern sans-serif typography (Inter or Montserrat).
acceptanceCriteria: Note card visually shows a frosted glass look via backdrop blur ~10px.
Card has a thin white semi-transparent border and rounded corners.
Text inside the card is center-aligned with generous line spacing.
App uses Inter or Montserrat as the primary sans-serif font (loaded via a web font or equivalent).

file_operations.description: Load the chosen web font (Inter or Montserrat) so the app uses it as the primary sans-serif.

Apply the primary font family globally and add glassmorphism styling utilities/classes for the note card (backdrop-filter blur(10px), thin semi-transparent border, rounded corners, centered text, generous line spacing).
Apply the glassmorphism card styling to the overlay note card container and ensure typography/spacing match the minimalist spec.

requirements.summary: Show the provided note text exactly and blur the bouquet/background behind the card when open with smooth open/close transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: The note card shows the message text exactly as provided (including punctuation, line breaks, and emojis).
When the note opens, the hero image/background behind it becomes slightly blurred.
Opening/closing the note uses smooth transitions (no abrupt popping).

file_operations.description: Insert the provided note content exactly (preserving line breaks and emojis) into the overlay; when open, apply a slight blur to the underlying hero/background and add smooth transitions for opening/closing.
Add CSS transition styles for the overlay/card appearance (opacity/transform) and for background blur changes to keep the interaction fluid and elegant.

requirements.summary: Add the required generated hero image under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it as the hero image without backend calls.
acceptanceCriteria: A generated image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used by the hero image component.
The app loads the hero image without requiring any backend calls.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static hero image asset at the required path and filename for direct frontend loading.
Wire the hero image to use the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sunflower-bouquet-hero.dim_1600x1600.png (no backend calls).
